Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: ruchit-p
Message:
chore: remove all GitHub Actions workflows

- Remove all CI/CD workflow files from .github/workflows/
- Disable automated testing, deployment, and monitoring workflows
- Keep manual deployment and testing capabilities intact
- Preserve pull request templates for code review process

Workflows removed:
- auto-fix-ci.yml - Automated CI fixing
- dev-checks.yml - Development branch checks
- firebase-ci-cd.yml - Firebase deployment automation
- mobile-ci-cd.yml - Mobile app CI/CD
- mobile-test.yml - Mobile testing automation
- production-blue-green.yml - Blue-green deployment
- production-deploy.yml - Production deployment automation
- production-monitoring.yml - Production monitoring
- security-scan.yml - Security vulnerability scanning
- staging-deploy.yml - Staging deployment automation
- web-ci-cd.yml - Web application CI/CD

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Description: Found a Stripe Access Token, posing a risk to payment processing services and sensitive financial data.
Author: ruchit-p
Message:
feat: add comprehensive Stripe subscription integration

- Add stripeSecrets.ts with secure secret management and fallbacks
- Implement complete Stripe type definitions for subscriptions, webhooks, and payments
- Define subscription plans (free, individual, family) with storage tiers
- Add checkout session, webhook event, and error handling types
- Include referral system and addon management structures
- Secure configuration using Firebase defineSecret for production

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: ruchit-p
Message:
feat: implement zero-knowledge vault encryption

- Add XChaCha20-Poly1305 encryption using libsodium
- Implement comprehensive security measures:
  - Path traversal protection
  - Dangerous file extension sanitization (.exe â†’ .exe.txt)
  - MIME type validation
  - Input sanitization for all vault operations
- Add vault encryption hooks and services for web app
- Implement key rotation and device management
- Add audit logging for SOC 2 compliance
- Add rate limiting for vault operations
- Add comprehensive test coverage for security features
- Add deployment scripts and documentation

Security: Server never has access to unencrypted content or keys
